properties.name: Family of Christ Food Distribution Program
Salvation Army, Brownsville Corps - Food Pantry
properties.notes:
'-  Must be registered. 
- Pink, orange, green, and yellow cards are given out to the community. Each card has a specific date of when to pick up food each month (once a month only). 
    - Can only get a colored card after providing ID
- Vegetables given out on Fridays to people with surplus cards
- Please bring your own bags or cart

properties.name: Health Essential Association, CPMM
properties.notes: - Available for people in the area

properties.name: YWCA Queens
properties.notes:
- Call listed number on Thursday to make an appointment for the following Wednesday
- ID required for first time

properties.name: Grand Street Settlement - Lower East Side
River Fund - Mobile Food Pantry, Brooklyn
properties.address: Corner of Linden Blvd & Crescent St
properties.notes:
'- Located in the Louis Pink Houses parking lot (mobile pantries) 
- Bring bags/shopping carts for groceries 
- ID is recommended

properties.name: Fellowship Missionary Baptist Church
properties.notes:
- Open to all
- Serves produce only
